# Euler rotation numerical integration


```sh
cmake .
make
./quaternions
```

```c++
    vec<double, 3> theta = {{0.1, 0.1, 0.1}}; // rotation
    vec<double, 3> omega = {{0, 0, 0}}; // rotational velocity
    vec<double, 3> alpha = {{0, 0.2, 0.1}}; // rotational acceleration
    float deltaT = 0.1;
```
